scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build:server: rimraf server/public && shx mkdir -p server/public && shx cp -r client/dist/* server/public/
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.package: npm run build && rimraf release.zip && jszip -r release.zip server/
scripts.start: cd server && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node index.js
